# Section 6: Safe Havens
[bold]6.1[/bold] Safe Havens are areas where antagonist activity is expected to be minimal, and generally non-violent. These areas are as follows: - The arrivals planet. - The arrivals shuttle. - The areas on station where the arrivals shuttle docks. - The evac shuttle after it has departed the station. - Central Command.
[bold]6.2[/bold] Disruptive behavior in safe havens is prohibited. This includes but is not limited to: - Murder (both with objectives and without) - The usage of explosives. - The usage of lethal weapons. - Releasing harmful chemical bombs. - Breaking into secure areas.
[bold]6.3[/bold] Within safe zones antagonists should lie low, not pursue their objectives, and not intentionally provoke encounters with security.
[bold]6.4[/bold] Safe Havens are expected to remain habitable for crew throughout the course of the round, and not targets of destruction by antagonists. - Making the evac shuttle uninhabitable before it departs is still in violation of this rule.
[bold]6.5[/bold] Hot pursuit rule: You are allowed to finish ongoing conflicts that carry over into safe havens. - This should still not result in an intentional breach of 6.4
[bold]6.6[/bold] Do not take advantage of arrivals and the surrounding area to avoid antag activity
